it.polimi.group03.domain

Class Bar

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.group03.domain.Bar

  • public class Bar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the configuration of a bar present on the board, each bar is represented by an unique id and an orientation, e.g "0 Horizontal" refers to the first horizontal bar on the board. This two fields form the unique key that will identify the bar in every moment of the game. A bar is set up with a predefined composition that indicates whether a slot in the bar is covered or holed, this composition is known as the keys of the bar. During the game is possible to change the position of the bar, this position can be INNER, CENTRAL or OUTER.

    It's used when a game has started and when a move is made. The initial position of each bar is set randomly.

    Since:
    08/11/2015.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    cecibloom, megireci, tatibloom
    See Also:
    BarPosition, BarOrientation, BarPosition, SlotInfo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int id
      ID of the bar: from 0 to 6.
      private SlotInfo[] keys
      Slots configuration: RED or BLACK for HORIZONTAL bars.
      private BarOrientation orientation
      Orientation of the bar: INNER, OUTER or CENTRAL.
      private BarPosition position
      Position of the bar: HORIZONTAL or VERTICAL.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bar(int id, BarOrientation orientation, BarPosition position)
      This constructor will set a fixed position.
      Bar(int id, BarOrientation orientation, SlotInfo[] keys)
      This is the default constructor, meant for the regular game (setting the initial position randomly).

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private int id
        ID of the bar: from 0 to 6.

      • keys

        private SlotInfo[] keys
        Slots configuration: RED or BLACK for HORIZONTAL bars. BLUE or BLACK for VERTICAL bars.

      • orientation

        private BarOrientation orientation
        Orientation of the bar: INNER, OUTER or CENTRAL.

      • position

        private BarPosition position
        Position of the bar: HORIZONTAL or VERTICAL.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bar

        public Bar(int id,
   BarOrientation orientation,
   BarPosition position)
        This constructor will set a fixed position. Used for performing the moves (on tests).
        Parameters:
        id - from 0 to 6
        orientation - Vertical - Horizontal
        position - INNER - OUTER - CENTRAL

      • Bar

        public Bar(int id,
   BarOrientation orientation,
   SlotInfo[] keys)
        This is the default constructor, meant for the regular game (setting the initial position randomly).
        Parameters:
        id - from 0 to 6
        orientation - Vertical Horizontal
        keys - Array containing the values for the slots.
